name: Admin Console Release 25.10.2
description: This release of the Admin Console brings you some improvements. See below for details on some of the more notable changes applied to the Admin Console.

IMPROVED.text: Removed the V2 reCAPTCHA, and only invisible reCAPTCHA is available under the JS Widgets section of the Admin Console.
Updated the Reset Password error message in Customer Management section of the Admin Console.
The unverified emails from the consumer's profile can be deleted using the corresponding delete button in the Admin Console.
